description: This file defines a React functional component named TopNav that renders the top navigation bar for a web application. It includes branding, a search input, navigation links, and quick action buttons for chat, notifications, and quick actions.

methods.name: TopNav({ onOpenChat, onOpenNotifications, onOpenQuick })
methods.description: A React functional component rendering the top navigation bar, accepting callback props for opening chat, notifications, and quick actions.

ctags.name: TopNav
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TopNav({ onOpenChat, onOpenNotifications, onOpenQuick }) {$/
